message: I'm offering you a fair split of $450000, which is close to 50-50. If you reject, the next round will have the money worth 20% less to me, so we both benefit from agreeing now.

Alice, I'm proposing a 55-45 split in my favor. This is fair because if you reject, in the next round the money will be worth 20% less to you. If we go to round 3, your $450000 would only be worth $360000 in value to you. This deal maximizes our collective value, as any further delays significantly reduce what you receive.
